metadata.name: My View of the Valley
metadata.description:
Around a corner on a steep incline this valley appeared and caused my heart to race. I had seen it before, but never green and never wet.  I love it when I find jewels in the desert wilderness. I spent the sunset hours walking all across this valley. I plan to revisit over the seasons and get to know it's changes and moods. 

Upon request, the NFT holder will receive high quality JPG suitable for printing.
